original_text: The Lord shall judge the people: judge me, O Lord, according to my righteousness, and according to mine integrity that is in me.
korean_text: 여호와께서 만민에게 심판을 행하시오니 여호와여 나의 의와 나의 성실함을 따라 나를 심판하소서

sentences.original_text: The Lord shall judge the people:
and according to mine integrity that is in me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 안에 있는 나의 성실함에 따라.
